articles.title: Microsoft and Asus’ Xbox handheld appears in leaked photos - The Verge
articles.description: The first photos have leaked of the Asus ROG Ally 2, along with an Xbox-branded version that’s likely Microsoft’s rumored ‘Project Kennan’ handheld.

articles.title: Sony Xperia 1 VII: New leak signals international release for Sony's first Snapdragon 8 Elite flagship - Notebookcheck
articles.description: The launch of the Xperia 1 VII is seemingly right around the corner. Sony's Xperia 1 VI successor appears destined for an international release too if a new leak is anything to go by.
